resources.string: Athelstan was a young Anglo-Saxon, was taken as a slave by Ragnar Lothbrok and his fellow Vikings from the monastery of Lindisfarne.
You arrived at this character through:
Björn Ironside is the firstborn son of Ragnar Lothbrok in the series \"Vikings\".
Flóki Vilgerðarson was the first to deliberately sail to Iceland. The history of the important historical character is documented in the Landnámabók manuscript.
Lagertha was, according to local legends, a Viking skjaldmö who lived in the territory of present-day Norway, having been the first wife of the famous Viking warrior Ragnar Lodbrok.
Ragnar Lodbrok or Ragnar Hairy Pants was a legendary king of Denmark and Sweden, who would have reigned during the 8th and 9th centuries.
Andarilho and sometimes Rolão, son of Ragnualdo, was a viking leader, founder and first ruler of the Duchy of Normandy in the period from 911 to 927.
